input_text:
Job Title: Custodian

Location: Bloomington, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
When you come to work at Ebenezer, we promise to support your growth, honor your strengths and empower you to make a difference in the lives of others  .  Named as a Star Tribune Top Workplace for the 11 th  time, Ebenezer is Minnesota’s largest senior living organization with over 100 years of excellent service, and we’re growing at an unprecedented rate!

Ebenezer Care Center is part of a full continuum of care campus including Transitional Care, Long Term Care, Adult Day, Assisted Living and Independent Living for a total of 114 beds . We are located just south of downtown Minneapolis, MN and are conveniently adjacent to many bus routes. We serve a VERY diverse and cultured population among not only o ur residents but staff as well. Our team includes a full time social wo rker, chapl ain and an onsite ASL interpreter located in our care center, which specializes in the needs of deaf residents.

We are looking for a Custodian, whom would be responsible for deep cleaning of carpeted surfaces, stripping, waxing and burnishing of hard floor surfaces.  This position may also perform general cleaning duties, all within our senior living community.

This position includes;

 0.4 FTE or 32 hours in 2 weeks  Evening shift/Every Weekend  Partially Benefit Eligible: (Paid Time Off, Medical, Dental, Matching Retirement, Education Scholarships. Cash Out Wages Before Payday with our New Benefit of Early Wage Access!) https://www.ebenezercares.org/employee-benefits 

Responsibilities/Job Description

Carpet sweeping, floor sweeping, mopping, and scrubbing

Carpet extraction

Stripping, waxing, and burnishing of hard floor surfaces

Assists housekeeping and laundry staff as needed

Assists with moving boxes, furniture, etc.

Empties and removes trash and recycling

Performs other duties assigned

Qualifications

Required Experience/Skills :

 Ability to work independently as well as part of a team  Able to read/understand instructions for safety sheets and information on chemicals, infection control practices and body mechanics.  Ability to perform relevant floor care procedures  Experience with mechanical equipment 

Preferred Experience/Skills :

 One year previous experience in a similar environment preferred  Experience in floor care, custodial and/or cleaning work preferred  High school diploma/GED preferred

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Custodian
job_responsibilities: Stripping, waxing, and burnishing of hard floor surfaces
Assists housekeeping and laundry staff as needed
Assists with moving boxes, furniture, etc.
Empties and removes trash and recycling

We are located just south of downtown Minneapolis, MN and are conveniently adjacent to many bus routes. We serve a VERY diverse and cultured population among not only o ur residents but staff as well. Our team includes a full time social worker, chapl ain and an onsite ASL interpreter located in our care center, which specializes in the needs of deaf residents.
